page.title: 05FARM ANIMALS
page.content: I HAVE SEEN LOTS OF GUERNSEY COWS AROUND OUR VILLAGE AND THERE ARE LOTS OF JERSEY COWS AS WELL.THEY ARE COMPLETELY LIGHT BROWN.THE GUERNSEY COWS ARE DARK BROWN WITH WHITE MARKINGS ON THEM.THE DOGS THEY USE ON THE FARMS ARE COLLIES THEY USE THEM TO ROUND UP THE SHEEP THE FARMER WHISTLES INSTRCTIONS AND THE DOG DOES IT STRAIGHT AWAY BECAUSE THEY ARE OBEDIENT.THERE ARE MANY HORSES IN OUR AREA ALL THE FARMS AROUND OUR VILLAGE HAVE HORSES ON THEM.THERE IS A GREY HORSE IN THE VILLAGE THEY ARE RIDDEN FOR PLEASURE NOW AND ARE NOT USED FOR WORK BECAUSE THE FARMERS ALL HAVE TRACTORS AND CARS.THERE ARE A FEW SHEEP ON THE FARMS THERE ARE BLACK ONES, GREY ONES AND MOST COMMON COLOUR IS WHITE THEY ARE VERY WOOLY.
